dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: It was a sunny day in the town of Southpeak. Our hero was just about to start his new adventure.

dialogues.speaker: Hero
dialogues.text: I feel ready for anything today. This is the day to start my journey!

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: And with determination in his eyes, our hero made his first steps into the unknown.

dialogues.speaker: Hero
dialogues.text: Wow, there are so many new things to see and do. I can't wait to explore!
